channel.title: I've searched and can't find out how to do this
channel.description: I added Vannaka and I want to have his slayer shop under edge but, I don't know what his shop ID is or really how to do it any help would be greatly appreciated thanks!

item.title: I've searched and can't find out how to do this
item.dc:creator: @0_def_xp 0 def xp
item.description:
@0_def_xp wrote:

This is what I had in client.java before you helped me

} else if (NPCID == 1597) { //Vannaka PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 30; //Vannaka's Slayer Shop

I also had this in shop.cfg before you helped me…

shop = 30	Vannaka's_Slayer_Shop

Yes I have items I just wanted to show you I have it

And it still doesn’t work…

Read full topic
item.source: I've searched and can't find out how to do this

item.title: I've searched and can't find out how to do this
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

First of all you add the talkto code in the client it looks kinda like this

If (npcid == NPCNUMBER){
wannashop = Shop number;
}

that is not the exact code im guestimating now for the shop number you open up your shops.cfg and add a new number lets say 88 you add the information you need their items ids amounts so on save it and you put wannashop = 88;

that should do it for you

Read full topic
